name: Lumos::Nox
description:
A story following a young adult female Lenna (a name that means inner lion strength) battling different demons throughout the game. The enemies are going to shape the person she is by the end of the game, as the demons Lenna will face are from her past and are her mental ones, shown in physical form. 

Play through each level Mania, Depression and Anxiety & chat to the NPC's to get a further understanding of Lenna's story.

Controls - Arrow keys or A, W, S, D keys for player movement, space bar for attacking, left mouse click for interactions and Esc key for pause menu.
